Class ExperienceService

java.lang.Object
com.vk.placeprep.service.ExperienceService
@Service @Transactional public class ExperienceService extends Object
Service class for managing interview experiences. Handles business logic for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting experiences, as well as searching and generating summaries.
Since:
2025-10-26
Version:
1.0
Author:
Venkatesh K

  • Constructor Details

    • ExperienceService

      public ExperienceService()

  • Method Details

    • getExperienceById

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public ExperienceResponse getExperienceById(Long id, Long currentUserId)
      Retrieves an experience by its ID with proper authorization checks.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the experience to retrieve
      currentUserId - The ID of the currently authenticated user (can be null for anonymous access)
      Returns:
      The experience response DTO
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the experience is not found
      UnauthorizedException - if the experience is not anonymous and doesn't belong to the current user

    • createExperience

      @Transactional public ExperienceResponse createExperience(ExperienceRequest request, Long userId)
      Creates a new interview experience for the specified user.
      Parameters:
      request - The experience data transfer object containing experience details
      userId - The ID of the user creating the experience
      Returns:
      The created experience as a response DTO
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the user is not found
      IllegalArgumentException - if the request is invalid

    • updateExperience

      @Transactional public ExperienceResponse updateExperience(Long id, ExperienceRequest request, Long userId)
      Updates an existing interview experience. Only the owner of the experience can update it.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the experience to update
      request - The updated experience data
      userId - The ID of the user making the request (must be the owner)
      Returns:
      The updated experience as a response DTO
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the experience is not found
      UnauthorizedException - if the user is not the owner of the experience

    • deleteExperience

      @Transactional public void deleteExperience(Long id, Long userId)
      Deletes an interview experience if the requesting user is the owner.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the experience to delete
      userId - The ID of the user making the request (must be the owner)
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the experience is not found or doesn't belong to the user

    • getExperienceSummary

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public ExperienceSummary getExperienceSummary(Long experienceId, Long userId)
      Generates a summary of an interview experience, including statistics about rounds and topics.
      Parameters:
      experienceId - The ID of the experience to summarize
      userId - The ID of the requesting user (for authorization)
      Returns:
      An ExperienceSummary DTO containing the summarized information
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the experience is not found
      UnauthorizedException - if the experience is not anonymous and doesn't belong to the user

    • getAllTopicsForUser

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public Set<String> getAllTopicsForUser(Long userId)
      Retrieves all unique interview topics covered across all experiences for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose topics to retrieve
      Returns:
      A set of unique topic strings

    • searchExperiences

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ExperienceResponse> searchExperiences(ExperienceSearchCriteria criteria, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Searches for experiences based on the provided criteria with pagination support. Results can be filtered by company name, job role, job type, final verdict, and more.
      Parameters:
      criteria - The search criteria to filter experiences
      pageable - Pagination information (page number, size, sorting)
      Returns:
      A page of experience responses matching the criteria
